# withoutImplicitStartAccessing

**Type Property**

A property that specifies that resolution doesn’t implicitly start accessing the ephemeral security-scoped resource.

## Declaration

```swift
static var withoutImplicitStartAccessing: NSURL.BookmarkResolutionOptions { get }
```

## Discussion

This option causes an implicit call to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSURL/startAccessingSecurityScopedResource()] on the returned URL when it’s ready to use the resource.

This option isn’t applicable to security-scoped bookmarks.

## Constants

- **withoutUI**: Specifies that no UI feedback should accompany resolution of the bookmark data.
- **withoutMounting**: Specifies that no volume should be mounted during resolution of the bookmark data.
- **withSecurityScope**: Specifies that the security scope, applied to the bookmark when it was created, should be used during resolution of the bookmark data.
